items.sentence: Does Tom know we\'ve never done this before?
Please drop in at my house on your way home.
Please just leave me alone. I want to think.
Please look at the pamphlet for the details.
Please mail this letter on your way to work.
How did you know that Tom didn\'t like Mary?
My older brother goes fishing every weekend.
It looks like you\'ve already been replaced.
I wonder whether or not Tom has left Boston.
I wonder whether or not Tom still does that.
I wonder why Tom wanted me to be here today.
I wonder why Tom wants to buy that for Mary.
I can\'t answer why, but I can tell you how.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all enjoy dancing.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all Canadians.
Tom, what would you like to have for dinner?
What if Tom and Mary don\'t want to do that?
Did you know that Tom has a criminal record?
Did you see the way Tom was looking at Mary?
Do you still have a key to Tom\'s apartment?
